db:abstract.db:para: SkyboxEntity is a convenience Entity subclass that can be used to insert a skybox in a 3D scene.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.5.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: By specifying a base name and an extension, SkyboxEntity will take care of building a TextureCubeMap to be rendered at runtime. The images in the source directory should match the pattern: base name + * "_posx|_posy|_posz|_negx|_negy|_negz" + extension
By default the extension defaults to .png.
Be sure to disable frustum culling in the FrameGraph through which the skybox rendering happens.

db:note.db:para: Please note that you shouldn't try to render a skybox with an orthographic projection.
